Renovation potential on generous north-facing block Auction Saturday 28 March  FIND. Opportunity awaits in this original home on a prime street in North Balgowlah. This single-level residence is nestled on a generous 682sqm block that enjoys a sunny north-facing aspect to the rear, possible dual-street access via Abingdon Street, and presents a few options for you to think about. Re-imagine the current layout, add another level, or knock down and build a brand new contemporary home (STCA). There is the space to consider adding a granny flat as well, so the options are endless. LOVE. This charming home has been lovingly maintained over the years and is presented in fantastic near-original condition. This allows you the flexibility of being able to move in now and carry out any renovations in stages. The house sits is a well-connected and central location that puts Manly and the city within easy reach, and supermarkets, cafes, bus stops and parks on the doorstep.  There is level access from the street, meaning easy access for any construction needs.  The house enjoys the possibility of dual-street access via Abingdon Street.  The garden is sunny and private, and currently includes structures for the laundry and a workshop. There is plenty of space to create a generous outdoor entertaining zone as well to fit in a large amount of lawn space, or even a granny flat.  The house is currently laid out with three generous bedrooms, generous living and an adjoining sunroom to the front of the house, and a large enclosed outdoor dining area to the rear.  The kitchen and bathroom are in immaculate condition, with a bath and overhead shower in the bathroom, and stone counters in the kitchen.  There is space for off-street parking for at least two cars, including a carport. LIVE. This central street is convenient for shopping, great schools and public transport, whilst also providing excellent access to Manly, Warringah Mall and the city. With North Harbour Reserve and Forty Baskets, as well as Stockland Balgowlah all within easy reach, this is a well-connected, convenient and highly sought-after location.
